name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D Live】Let My Voice Enchant You Tonight! #3DKobornDay2025 [jNCGOv8Zz1A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru performs 'Anata no koto ga suki da nante ienai desu' on a 3D stage with clouds and a rainbow.
scenes.song_name: Anata no koto ga suki da nante ienai desu

scenes.description: MC section where Kobo talks to the audience about her 3D stage and upcoming guests.

subtitles.original: 言えるかな
subtitles.english: Can I say it?

subtitles.original: 全てをひっくり返すくらいの一番なセリフは
subtitles.english: The best line that would turn everything upside down

subtitles.original: 言えそうにないや
subtitles.english: Doesn't seem like I can say it

subtitles.original: どうしてもこの気持ちは
subtitles.english: No matter what, this feeling

subtitles.original: 抑えられそうにはないんだ
subtitles.english: Doesn't seem like it can be suppressed

subtitles.original: あなたと出会ったあの日から
subtitles.english: From that day I met you

subtitles.original: ずっと気持ちは変わらないけど
subtitles.english: My feelings haven't changed, but...

subtitles.original: あなたのことが好きだなんて言えないんです
subtitles.english: I can't say I like you

subtitles.original: この気持ち伝わるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if these feelings will reach you

subtitles.original: 足掻いたって空回り
subtitles.english: Struggling, I just go in circles

subtitles.original: 何も言えずまたさよなら
subtitles.english: Can't say anything, so goodbye again

subtitles.original: あなたのことが好きすぎて堪らないんです
subtitles.english: I love you so much I can't stand it

subtitles.original: 明日こそは言いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to say it tomorrow for sure

subtitles.original: あなたも僕と同じように
subtitles.english: If you, just like me,

subtitles.original: 恋してたらなんて考えてる
subtitles.english: Were in love, I'm thinking...

subtitles.original: でも分かってる
subtitles.english: But I know

subtitles.original: 考えすぎってこと
subtitles.english: That I'm overthinking it

subtitles.original: Kobo Kanaeru at your service. Let me be your sun to shine your day!
subtitles.english: Kobo Kanaeru at your service. Let me be your sun to shine your day!

subtitles.original: Hi everyone! Konbanwa!
subtitles.english: Hi everyone! Good evening!

subtitles.original: こぼ・かなえるです！
subtitles.english: I'm Kobo Kanaeru!

subtitles.original: こぼの3D生誕配信へようこそ！
subtitles.english: Welcome to Kobo's 3D birthday stream!

subtitles.original: Welcome to Kobo Kanaeru's 3D birthday stream 2025! Pachi pachi pachi!
subtitles.english: Welcome to Kobo Kanaeru's 3D birthday stream 2025! Clap clap clap!

subtitles.original: How was Kobo's performance? Hmm? Hmm?
subtitles.english: How was Kobo's performance? Hmm? Hmm?

subtitles.original: どうだった？
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original: またギターで出てきたよね？えへ！
subtitles.english: I came out with a guitar again, right? Hehe!

subtitles.original: えーっとちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Um, wait a second.

subtitles.original: Let me put the guitar down first.
subtitles.english: Let me put the guitar down first.

subtitles.original: よしよしよしよし。んしょ。
subtitles.english: Heave-ho, heave-ho, heave-ho, heave-ho. There we go.

subtitles.original: Okay! Fuu! Hai!
subtitles.english: Okay! Phew! Alright!

subtitles.original: Once again, welcome to Kobo's 3D birthday stream 2025!
subtitles.english: Once again, welcome to Kobo's 3D birthday stream 2025!

subtitles.original: こぼの3D生誕配信へようこそ！
subtitles.english: Welcome to Kobo's 3D birthday stream!

subtitles.original: This time, I, Kobo, will be hosting an...
subtitles.english: This time, I, Kobo, will be hosting an...

subtitles.original: アイドルみたいコンサート、テーマ3D生誕配信...
subtitles.english: idol-like concert themed 3D birthday stream...

subtitles.original: ...for about an hour
subtitles.english: ...for about an hour

subtitles.original: with a lot of amazing and awesome guests. I bet you guys can't wait!
subtitles.english: with a lot of amazing and awesome guests. I bet you guys can't wait!

subtitles.original: Hey Kobo, おいしそう、ちょっと違... あー！
subtitles.english: Hey Kobo, looking tasty, wait that's different... Ah!

subtitles.original: Chat nice, nice eyes chat. You noticed it!
subtitles.english: Chat, nice, nice eyes chat. You noticed it!

subtitles.original: Yeah, you're right. Look at Kobo's new stage! Wah!
subtitles.english: Yeah, you're right. Look at Kobo's new stage! Wah!

subtitles.original: でかい！
subtitles.english: It's huge!

subtitles.original: 新しいステージだよ！
subtitles.english: It's a new stage!

subtitles.original: There's a big Cilus right here.
subtitles.english: There's a big Cilus right here.

subtitles.original: チルス、大きなチルス。
subtitles.english: Cilus, a big Cilus.

subtitles.original: おにゅおにゅおにゅおにゅ... えへへ！
subtitles.english: Onyu onyu onyu onyu... ehehe!

subtitles.original: And so many stars! Stars! So many stars!
subtitles.english: And so many stars! Stars! So many stars!

subtitles.original: And then a big, a big rainbow right here! Big, very big rainbow!
subtitles.english: And then a big, a big rainbow right here! Big, very big rainbow!

subtitles.original: And so many clouds because... mmm... I don't know, I think it's just very aesthetic.
subtitles.english: And so many clouds because... mmm... I don't know, I think it's just very aesthetic.

subtitles.original: Yeah, and the floor! Floor!
subtitles.english: Yeah, and the floor! Floor!

subtitles.original: フロア見て、わあ！なんかパターン...
subtitles.english: Look at the floor, wow! Some kind of pattern...

subtitles.original: 海みたい。
subtitles.english: It's like the sea.

subtitles.original: You know? Yeah, like my hair. Hehe.
subtitles.english: You know? Yeah, like my hair. Hehe.

subtitles.original: So, um, don't forget to take a lot of screenshots, okay?
subtitles.english: So, um, don't forget to take a lot of screenshots, okay?

subtitles.original: Especially later, okay? Get a lot of screenshots! Okay?
subtitles.english: Especially later, okay? Get a lot of screenshots! Okay?

subtitles.original: And then post your comments, your moments, your impressions, everything with the hashtag #3DKobornDay2025 on your SNS.
subtitles.english: And then post your comments, your moments, your impressions, everything with the hashtag #3DKobornDay2025 on your SNS.

subtitles.original: そして、こぼの3Dバースデー配信、SNSにハッシュタグ #3DKobornDay2025 をつけて...
subtitles.english: And post about Kobo's 3D birthday stream on SNS with the hashtag #3DKobornDay2025...

subtitles.original: コメントや思い出、感想などなど投稿してね！
subtitles.english: And post your comments, memories, impressions, and so on!

subtitles.original: Right, are you guys ready for the next performance? Hmm hmm hmm?
subtitles.english: Right, are you guys ready for the next performance? Hmm hmm hmm?

subtitles.original: Okay, let's go to the next performance! Mmm... wait, I try to remember...
subtitles.english: Okay, let's go to the next performance! Mmm... wait, I'm trying to remember...
